summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the Ticket Management System for Acqua Park. All backend APIs (23 tests) passed. Frontend UI testing verified all new admin pages (TicketsManager, AvailabilityManager, StaffManager) and the Staff Check-In page work correctly.

issues: Uses browser's native date picker instead of a custom shadcn calendar component - minor UX inconsistency

critical_code_review_comments: ticket_routes.py imports 'qrcode' module but it's not used in the current implementation - can be removed to clean up dependencies
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for key interactive elements in StaffCheckIn.jsx
seed_data_creation: Test staff and availability entries were created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Ticket management system fully tested. Backend APIs for ticket-availability, staff management, staff login, and ticket validation all working. Frontend admin pages (TicketsManager, AvailabilityManager, StaffManager) and StaffCheckIn page all functional. The system uses JWT tokens for staff authentication separate from admin auth. Ticket codes follow format 'TKT-XXXXXXXXXXXX'.

frontend_pages: /check-in - StaffCheckIn - Staff login and ticket validation
